ChatMapperProject.Title: Standard Project
ChatMapperProject.Description: Default project with two actors and default asset fields.

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Gee, Thanks.| You are the sencond person to notice that today.

Field.Hint: A description of what is going on during this dialogue.
Field.Title: Parenthetical

Field.Hint: A collection of audio files that should be played during this dialogue.
Field.Title: Audio Files

Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is displayd to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: I mean, I've always thought you were good looking and all, I just-| Oh my god, I didn't mean to come across like that, it's not like like I was hitting on you or anything.| I mean, you are a cute guy, objectively speaking, but...| I wasn't...| ...| You sure you are OK?| Not that it's any of my business...

Field.Value: You are looking good yourself, Moe.

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: You are looking good yourself, Moe. Is that shirt new?

Field.Hint: A description of what is going on during this dialogue.

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Oh, you noticed? I mean-| Yeah. Well, not really.| I picked it up a few days ago for tonight's show. 12 cents at the Salvation Army.| A real steal.
